customFiles.html:
Chart type: <select (change)="changeChartType($event)">
  <option value="bar-chart">Bar chart</option>
  <option value="column-chart">Column chart</option>
  <option value="donut-chart">Donut</option>
</select>
<luzmo-viz-item
  [type]="chartType"
  style="max-width:800px; height:400px;"
></luzmo-viz-item>
